name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Supermail : Boost email clarity, tone, and grammar for professional impact

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI tool that helps craft professional, polished emails quickly with improved grammar, clarity, and tone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Supermail is designed for individuals aiming to elevate the professionalism of their email content within Google Mail. By adding an “Start AI” button next to the “Send” button, users can easily optimize their email text for clarity, tone, and grammatical accuracy. The extension works seamlessly in both new emails and reply windows, providing quick and effective enhancements to ensure high-quality communication. 

Now supporting profiles - Professional, Private and Custom.
